wikipedia_page.main: Peter Gunby (born 20 November 1934) is an English former professional football player and coach.

link_mentions.page: List of Bradford City A.F.C. players (1–49 league appearances)

response: Following two seasons in and just outside of the promotion play-off places, Leeds made a poor start to the season, taking six points from the first six games. A League Cup victory against Peterborough United was not enough to prevent manager and former team captain Billy Bremner from being sacked. Howard Wilkinson was appointed as the new manager on 10 October after a brief caretaker stint by Peter Gunby.
